id, store_nid, store_name, manage_user_name, mer_id, partner_id, manage_mobile, store_mobile, status, per_capita, industry_category, store_province, store_address, coordinate, coordinate_x, coordinate_y, del_flag, create_user_id, update_user_id, create_time, update_time, introduction
mapper.select: SELECT *, ST_Distance_Sphere ( POINT(#{lnt},#{lat}), coordinate ) a FROM yx_store_info WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere ( POINT(#{lnt},#{lat}), coordinate ) <= 1000 order by a

SELECT si.id, si.store_nid, si.store_name, si.manage_user_name, si.mer_id, si.partner_id, si.manage_mobile, si.store_mobile, si. STATUS, si.per_capita, si.industry_category, si.store_province, si.store_address, si.coordinate, si.coordinate_x, si.coordinate_y, si.del_flag, si.create_user_id, si.update_user_id, si.create_time, si.update_time, si.introduction, IFNULL(SUM(sp.sales), 0) AS sales FROM yx_store_info si LEFT JOIN yx_store_product sp ON sp.store_id = si.id where si.del_flag = 0 and si.`status` = 0 and si.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeName},'%') GROUP BY si.id ORDER BY sales ${sort}, si.create_time DESC;

SELECT si.id, si.store_nid, si.store_name, si.manage_user_name, si.mer_id, si.partner_id, si.manage_mobile, si.store_mobile, si.`status`, si.per_capita, si.industry_category, si.store_province, si.store_address, si.coordinate, si.coordinate_x, si.coordinate_y, si.del_flag, si.create_user_id, si.update_user_id, si.create_time, si.update_time, si.introduction, IFNULL( SUM( spr.product_score + service_score ), 0 ) AS socre FROM yx_store_info si LEFT JOIN yx_store_product_reply spr ON si.mer_id = spr.mer_id where si.del_flag = 0 and si.`status` = 0 and si.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeName},'%') GROUP BY si.id ORDER BY socre ${sort}, si.create_time DESC;

SELECT si.id, si.store_nid, si.store_name, si.manage_user_name, si.mer_id, si.partner_id, si.manage_mobile, si.store_mobile, si.`status`, si.per_capita, si.industry_category, si.store_province, si.store_address, si.coordinate, si.coordinate_x, si.coordinate_y, si.del_flag, si.create_user_id, si.update_user_id, si.create_time, si.update_time, si.introduction, spn.salesCount as salesCount, IFNULL(spr.replyCount,0) AS replyCount FROM yx_store_info si LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(sp.sales), 0) AS salesCount, store_id, COUNT(sp.id) AS productCount FROM yx_store_product sp GROUP BY sp.store_id ) AS spn ON spn.store_id = si.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND( AVG( product_score + service_score ), 1 ) AS replyCount, mer_id FROM yx_store_product_reply GROUP BY mer_id ) AS spr ON si.mer_id = spr.mer_id WHERE si.del_flag = 0 AND si.`status` = 0 and si.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeName},'%') GROUP BY si.id ORDER BY replyCount ${scoreOrder}, salesCount ${salesOrder}, si.create_time DESC;
